description: Hands down the best late night pizza spot in the city. The crust is simply outstanding. It is the perfect combination of airy yet crispy. Plus there is a Robin Williams wall. A+
author: Bruce E.

description: Not sure if I was drunk but the pizza was freaking good! Just your typical late night pizza joint where they grab a slice and reheat it in the oven for you. What I like about this place is that the whole crust is crispy. Edge and bottom! So when you pick up the slice your toppings don't just slide right off. I will definitely go back and eat it again. Hopefully this time sober so I can remember if is really good...or not.
author: David W.

description: Incredible pizza and service was A+++ Fernando was suuuuuper friendly and very professional made my family and I visit very pleasant!!!! Highly recommended!!!
author: Jimmy G.

description:
I was yelping for a new place to order a pizza and came across this place b/c it sound hopeful. I registered on line, placed an order, but it would not take the coupon code. I decided to call and give it to them verbally but they told me they didn't deliver to my address and gave me phone number that belonged to their "other" location closer to my home. 

So why the f*ck did it accept my address on their website but not on the phone?

The telephone number they gave me belonged to "Irving pizza" which is not even related to them. Hopefully I'll have a great review for them instead because this place is confused.
author: May G.

description: $3 for an epic slice of heaven!  Great price and great taste.  Perfect to-go spot in the Marina
author: Donovan W.

description: Pizza was good. We got a slice if cheese and supreme. The supreme was better, mostly because the cheese should have been heated more. The crust layer is a bit thick, but still good. At least it's even (unlike mr. Pizza man). I would definitely go back here for a late night slice after having a fee drinks.
author: Mas M.

description: Great pizza for the price! Crust is so good! Delivery is always on time. Slices late night are my fav! See you guys again soon!
author: Chris B.

description: Great cheap late-night eats, prompt, clean, good service. Big selection of bottled beers. Spinach calzone is excellent. Has WiFi.
author: S M.

description: Just ordered take-out! - fast, hot and cheesy!  sauce was great.  I need the sauce to be great - not much for have the garden on my pizza.  Thanks Howard.
author: Allan B.

description: This is my favorite pizza place in the Marina.  I live in the Excelsior and it's always worth the trip to come here because of the nice ambience!  They make the best "hot slice" (for those of you New Yorkers) in SF.  The crust is thin and the cheese is extremely tasty...always reminds me of NY pizza.
author: ron c.

description: As mentioned by other reviewers, a great spot to get a "slice". Crust and sauce were good. Not much seating, 5 spots, but definitely somewhere you can't go wrong if you're on the go and need to get something fast.
author: Sam S.

description: Expensive but it delivers as advertised. I ordered cheese but they were out. It would have been cool if he had gave me the pepperoni for the cheese price
author: Christopher R.

description: Fantastic pizza, friendly staff. The owner is a great guy too, works hard. I always see him making pizzas himself. Pretty impressive.
author: K. N.

description: The guys working r super nice and fast. The crust was a bit too thick for me but I can't knock off any stars for that since I didn't ask if they had thin crust or not. Overall pretty decent slice of pepperoni. And with the yelp check in deal of a free slice, can't beat the price of a little more than $4 for two slices.
author: Ann H.

description: I discovered this place last summer when in town, and made sure I stopped by again this year sure enough pizza was great then and great now. Love their pizza by the slice.
author: Dom P.

description: Great pizza - Nothing fancy-shmancy but just good solid pizza.  If you are a "foodie" stay away, you will doubtlessly find something to complain about.  If you are a "normie" then you'll be completely satisfied.
author: Shirley S.

description: This use to be Irving pizza, which was my favorite!  It's changed and  definitely NOT as good!  I'm going to miss my weekly pizza and wings night.
author: Audrey G.

description: They are good at texting the delivery notifications and the ability to order onlne but the pizza was really bad.  Bad crust.  I asked for extra sauce and it didn't seem like there was any sauce on there.  I got a Greek Salad for my wife and it didn't come with any dressing.
author: Frank M.

description: Amazing late night pizza.  Friendly service, great quality, and cool small place.
author: Ross W.
